comments:
When creating a Was V51 or V50 server the WebSphere installation directory 
value returned by RAC is incorrect:
C:\Program 
Files\IBM\AgentController\plugins\org.eclipse.hyades.test\lib\junit.jar

instead of C:\WAS_Base_V51\WebSphere\AppServer for the Was v51 Home_Directory.
and instead of D:\WAS_Base_V50\WebSphere\AppServer for the Was v50 
Home_Directory.
______________________________________________________________________________

If manually added the correct path to the WebSphere installation directory and 
tried to start the server I get an error. 
(NOTE: If I use the Candidate RAD SW installation with a 2 week older version 
of RAC installation, I would get from RAC the correct value for the WebSphere 
installation directory and the server will start successfully.)

However, with the latest version of RAC installation used with the same RAD 
Candidate SW installation I get an incorrect value for WebSphere installation 
directory and the following errors when starting the server:
